title: I m not getting chest or keys : Riot stop trolling
body: Everyone got and still getting skins from chests but i got 0 ? i play games daily still waiting

replies.poster: Q r a f T e e
replies.body: Have you been banned or otherwise punished for toxicity? You can't earn them if you've been banned for some time. I think a Rioter mentioned on Reddit that punished players need to be at a reformed state before earning stuff:  https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4ak56c/if_you_were_previously_bannedchat_banned_you_are/d11c1nm

While key fragment drops can be very rare, not receiving boxes when you should sounds like you might be restricted from receiving them.  We do have a [Hextech Restrictions article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) that should help explain things if you in-fact are not eligible to get rewards!

> [{quoted}](name=FreedomsFaith,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zpM6JtHd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-05T18:35:06.760+0000)
>
> i got the same problem.............i been working and working and finally got an S rank with both Teemo and Jhin but i got nothing and my bestie that plays Vayne all day long and...to be honnest she isnt that good and plays only a few time SHEEE GOT 2 BOXES IN ONE DAY
> i just dont get it.....she got no rank AND A PILE OF BOXES 
> WTFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF
> seriously

same.. My friend who i duo with is unranked when we played so many normal games together : after game ends he told me that he got skin or keys always .. and i still have 0 skins and keys 

Riot is shitt
